title: Shakespeare -Ten Great Comedies - TMS
description:
Shakespeare: Ten Great Comedies

The Modern Scholar - TMS


Professor Raphael Shargel channels his passion for teaching and expertise as a Shakespearean scholar into this illuminative study of the Immortal BardÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ten great comedies. ShakespeareÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s genius is as readily apparent in these comedies as in his timeless tragedies. Often marked by internal and external conflicts, young lovers struggling for union, mistaken identities, and intertwining plots, ShakespeareÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s comedies to this day reveal the masterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s unparalleled insight into the human condition. With a fresh take on some of ShakespeareÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most cherished and widely seen works, Professor Shargel provides an invaluable understanding of these exquisite comedies.
